column4: can anyone solve my problem which i posted here  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1170177
looks like catkiller had some good advice... about as good as it comes
because Intel graphic are bottom rung, they for lack of better words "suck"

been running ubuntu for 1.5 yr so i am still green, but yes vast majority of graphic issues come from intel, ATI second to that , and nvidia seems to be the best so far.. i just got an nvidia 9500gt card that i love
if you can afford a card... no thought needed
just a thought... did you try booting to recovery and then selecting fix-x? caution tho, back up /etc/X11/xorg.conf first as it will be replaced
not much luv for intel in the room atm lol
if your following the other discussions... intel graphics issues
as in intel sux if you watch long enough you will form the same opinion
for kicks pastebin your xorg.conf plz
in fact google returned your trouble thread lol
can you pastebin your current xorg.conf ?
yes i know... that was a week ago, updates, your fiddling, anything could have changed
yes i am trying to find something
